nodes.text: Devaronian's food cake was a type of cake made by the Devaronians, a sentient species native to the planet Devaron. Besides being edible to members of the Devaronian species, the dessert dish could also be eaten by individuals belonging to the Besalisk species.

Created by the Devaronian species, Devaronian's food cake was one of many foods discovered and enjoyed by the Besalisk Dexter Jettster in his life, during which he spent years traveling throughout the galaxy. The food cake was eventually served by the Besalisk chef at Dex's Diner, a restaurant he owned in CoCo Town on the planet Coruscant, before the diner's destruction during the first two years of the Galactic Empire. Jettster served the cake as one of the restaurant's desserts for 2.7 credits a slice.
Devaronian's food cake was featured in "Dining at Dex's," a 2009 StarWars.com Hyperspace article written by Gregory Walker in the form of an in-universe menu for Dex's Diner.
